infotexts.afflictiondescription.fatigue.low: You could use a break to regain your energy.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.fatigue.high: You can't run like this for much longer, you need to stop and catch your breath.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_presolatexinfe: The patient's dermal, subcutaneous and muscle tissues are rapidly being converted into Preso Latex. The affected areas beginning to rapidly shut down, with the patient's skin turning an anoxic black.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.scp_presolatexinf: Turned into a lifeless rubber statue.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.scp_presolate: You have been converted into a lifeless rubber statue of your former self.
infotexts.descscppresomin: The patient's upper cutaneous skin layers are beginning to grow an anoxic black, a sense of numbness present in the affected areas.
infotexts.descscppresomod: The patient's body is growing lethargic, the Preso Latex converting the subcutaneous tissue layers and clouding their vision.
infotexts.descscppresosev: The patient's internal organs are being rapidly converted, their consciousness rapidly degrading and are showing signs of respiratory arrest.
infotexts.descscppresomax: The patient has entirely turned into a completely lifeless rubber statue inside and out, the skin cold to the touch.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_devilpoisoning: The patient's skin is slowly becoming vividly flushed, the epidermal and dermal tissues showing apparent signs of spontaneous hemorrhaging, along with the patient suffering from severe expistaxis and subconjunctival hemorrhages to the major eye blood vessels.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.scp_devilpois: Your internal organs have been liquefied by Devil's Blood.
infotexts.descscpdevilmin: The patient's skin is growing strangely sore looking, with the ears and eyes beginning to spontaneously bleed.
infotexts.descscpdevilmod: The patient's mouth is dripping with blood and the skin is developing bleeding lesions that pour out blood at an alarming rate.
infotexts.descscpdevilsev: The patient is rapidly falling into hypovolemic shock as blood pours out of every oraphace, the skin all over gushing out blood.
infotexts.descscpdevilmax: The patient has been completely exsanguinated, a bloody mess of ruptured veins and arteries is all that's left.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_vomiting: The patient's GI tract is significantly disturbed by something, near constantly having to stop in order to vomit, the signs of hematemesis visible as blood is beginning to appear.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.scp_vomiting: You have choked on your own vomit.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_vomitingblood: The patient's GI tract is showing signs of rupturing, occasionally vomiting large volumes of blood.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.scp_vomitingb: You have bled to death internally.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_hexgasdamage: The patient is experiencing rapid degredation of the CNS, cardiovascular and muscular systems, their skin growing necrotic before your eyes.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.scp_hexgasdamage: Rapidly burnt away on the inside and out.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.scp_hexgasdam: You haved died from the effects of Hexa-Nova exposure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_psidamage: The patient's CNS is heavily overstimulated from being exposed to anomalous electromagnetic fields, their vision blurry and their body violently twitching.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.scp_psidamage: Your Nervous System was destroyed via Psi-radiation exposure.
infotexts.descscppsimin: The patient's CNS has been exposed to anomalous electromagnetic radiation, their eyes dance around and their body twitches every so often.
infotexts.descscppsimod: The patient's CNS has been heavily overstimulated from being exposed to anomalous electromagnetic radiation, their vision is hampered and their co-ordination significantly degraded.
infotexts.descscppsisev: The patient's CNS has been severely overstimulated from being exposed to anomalous electromagnetic radiation, their brain is rapidly shutting down alongside most of the CNS being heavily damaged.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_psidamagechron: The patient's CNS remains permanently damaged after prolonged exposure to Psi-Radiation.
infotexts.descscppsichronmin: The patient is experiencing permanent long term effects of Psi-Radiation exposure and is constantly agitated and paranoid, their body forever slightly trembling.
infotexts.descscppsichronmod: The patient is experiencing permanent long term effects of Psi-Radiation exposure, their entire body continues to ache, their consciousness is clouded and appear to be developing Alzheimers related symptoms.
infotexts.descscppsichronsev: The patient is experiencing permanent and severe side effects from their previous Psi-Radiation exposure, they have a never-ending migraine and face difficulties in doing even the most basic of coordination.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_psiresistance: The patient's body is inhibiting Serotonin and has become more resistant to Psi-Radiation induced overstimulation.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scp_firelatexburn: The patient is suffering severe burns that encompass the entire body part internally and externally, causing unfathomable pain.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.scp_firelatex: Your body was incinerated via Ignis Latex.
infotexts.scpfirelatexburnmin: The patient has Ignis Latex stuck onto their body, the tissue damage however appears minimal for the time being.
infotexts.scpfirelatexburnmod: The patient is experiencing significant burn damage from Ignis Latex, the injury seeping deep into the affected body part.
infotexts.scpfirelatexburnsev: The patient is suffering severe Ignis Latex burns that encompass the entire body part internally and externally, leaving a horrific scene.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.methwithdrawal: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.methoverdose: The patient has pinpoint pupils and icy cold skin. They struggle to breathe and swallow.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.methaddiction: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.steroidwithdrawal: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.steroidoverdose: The patient has pinpoint pupils and icy cold skin. They struggle to breathe and swallow.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.steroidaddiction: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.incision: A precise surgical incision is present.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.incision: You have died due to a surgical incision.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.anesthesia: The patient shows symptoms of exposure to an anesthesia.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.missingorgan: The patient seems unstable due to missing specific missing organs.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.morphineaffliction: The patient seems calm and painless.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bloodclot: Specific areas are turning pale and a visible barrier between pale and non pale skin can be seen.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.bloodclot: You died of a blood clot.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.surgeryreadyimplan: The patient has an unnatural amount of adrenaline.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.infection.low: The patient's immune system is handling a wound infection somewhat well - treatments for other infections are likely to be fully effective still.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.infection: The patient's immune system is occupied with a wound infection, rendering treatments for other types of infection less effective.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.infection.high: The patient's immune system is spread far too thin keeping a wound infection from advancing, rendering treatments against other kinds of infection nigh useless without a very high dosage.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.feniternervea: Your body shut down after your nerves were destroyed by nerve agent.
You feel weak and you've got a nasty headache. Your body feels harder and harder to control.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.feniternerveagent: The subject is lethargic and experiencing loss of motor control. Immediate treatment required.
Your head throbs and your body won't move, no matter how hard you try.
The subject is experiencing rapid paralysis. Death is imminent.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.feniterpulmonarya: Suffocation due to Buildup of fluid in the lungs.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.feniterpulmon: You suffocated after fluids built up in your lungs due to pulmonary agent buildup.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.feniterpulmonaryag: Your breaths don't feel large enough. You need more air, no matter how much you breathe.
Subject is suffering from fluid buildup in the lungs due to pulmonary agent exposure. Immediate treatment is necessary.
You can't breathe... Something is in your throat, your lungs... .
Subject is suffering from critical fluid buildup in the lungs, preventing breathing. Death is imminent without treatment.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.feniterpulmonarya: Suffocation due to Buildup of fluid in the lungs.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.feniterpulmon: You suffocated after fluids built up in your lungs due to pulmonary agent exposure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.feniterpulmonaryag: You feel like air isn't reaching your lungs, and they feel irritated, and your face hurts a bit.
The lining in the subject's lungs is being actively destroyed due to exposure to pulmonary agents.
The air here hurts to breathe, you need to go somewhere else, fast.
Prolonged exposure to pulmonary agents is causing complete destruction of the lining in the subject's lungs.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.feniterblooda: Your red blood cells were destroyed by blood agent.
You feel faint, lethargic and you feel like you're not getting enough oxygen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.feniterbloodagent: Subject's veins and arteries are an abnormally bright red color. Subject is experiencing catastrophic hemolytic anemia.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.feniterblisterage: Suffocation due to destruction of the lungs.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.feniterbliste: Your lungs were destroyed after prolonged exposure to blistering agent.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.feniterblisteragen: Your lungs burn and itch, like they're being melted from the inside.
Dangerous amounts of blistering agents have built up in the subject's lungs.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.feniternonlethala: Suffocation due to extended tear gas exposure.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.feniternonlet: You suffocated after being exposed to tear gas for dangerous amounts of time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.feniternonlethalag: Your eyes hurt a lot. Your face feels like it's burning. Your throat is calling you to puke.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.feniterpsycho: Your brain shut down after high exposure to psychochemical agents.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.feniterpsychoagent: Your perception of reality is failing.
Subject is experiencing hallucinations and memory loss.
